title: DESIGNER'S ONBOARD
description: Artify-UI is a gathering of enthusiasts who are interested in enhancing the user experience of digital products such as websites, apps, software, and other interactive tools. This event is a great opportunity for designers, researchers, and developers to showcase and test their skills in creating an intuitive and visually appealing user interface for a digital product with other attendees.
rules: Participants are instructed to use only figma for designing.
Readymade templates should not be used strictly.
The judge's decision will be final.
